Claim: "A girl with a flower on her shirt rides a skateboard."
Implication: "A girl rides a skateboard with a boy."
Referring expressions: Girl, flower, shirt, skateboard.  A girl, boy, skateboard
Formula: (exists a (exists b (exists d (IsWithFlower(a) and IsOnShirt(b) and IsRidesSkateboard(d))))) -> (exists f (exists g (IsRidesSkateboard(g) and IsWithBoy(f))))
